posts.post_title: T205 Christy Mathewson SGC 1 for Sale / Trade....SOLD!!
posts.post_content:
Has vertical wrinkling (does not break the surface) and a small pen mark on the reverse.  $675 delivered or would trade generously for N300 Mayo Cut Plugs.

** Edited to add that the white mark above his left ear and covering the edge of the cap is glare from my phone and NOT actually a flaw on the card

Thanks much!
